section.p: To make effective use of the , you need to consider the following prerequisites.

note.p: OASIS DITA Adoption TC white papers have no system or software requirements beyond those required by the . Review the GitHub home page for the at for updated prerequisites.

section.title: System requirements
section.p: To use the , your system needs to support the following.

li.p: Liberation Sans font: Install the open-source Liberation Sans font for official OASIS publications generated from the .
For information about installing the Adobe Liberation Sans font see Liberation Sans.

section.title: Software requirements
section.p: Before installing and configuring the , you need to install the following layered software.

ul.li: Java SDK/JDK: If you have never installed the DITA Open Toolkit, you may need to install some version of the Java SDK/JDK. See Prerequisite software for the DITA Open Toolkit for installation instructions.

DITA Open Toolkit: The are distributed as plug-ins for the DITA Open Toolkit version or higher. See Installing DITA Open Toolkit for instructions about installing DITA-OT on your Windows, MacOS, or Linux system.

li.p: Antenna House PDF Formatter: The oasis-pdf-committeeNote and oasis-pdf-specification transformation types require that Antenna House be installed on your system. The oasis-pdf-generic transformation type does not.

If you have some version of the Antenna House PDF Formatter installed on your system, you may need to update the axf.path and/or axf.cmd DITA-OT properties defining the local filepath and local executable name of the PDF Formatter.

If you do not have a version of the Antenna House PDF Formatter installed on your system, you can still generate pre-production PDF output using the DITA-OT default processor (fop) by updating the OASIS PDF stylesheet properties or by specifying the fop processor on the dita command line (-Dpdf.formatter=fop).
